ch.iserver.ace.algorithm.test
Class RelayNode

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.algorithm.test.AbstractNode
      ch.iserver.ace.algorithm.test.RelayNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenerationNode, Node, ReceptionNode
public class RelayNode
extends AbstractNode
implements ReceptionNode, GenerationNode

Node implementation that represents a relay event on the server. The server receives operations from the clients and then relays it to the clients (after appropriate transformations have been done). This node exactly represents that event.

Constructor Summary
RelayNode(String siteId, String reference, String id)
          Creates a new relay node residing at the given site, referencing the given event (receiving side) and having the given event id.

getSuccessors

public List getSuccessors()
Description copied from interface: Node
Gets a list of successors of this node. This includes local successors (i.e. from the same site) as well as in some cases remote successors.

Note that the return value is never null. If there are no successors, implementors should return an empty list.

Specified by:
getSuccessors in interface Node
Returns:
the list of successors

accept

Description copied from interface: Node
Accepts the given node visitor. This is used for double dispatching.

Specified by:

Parameters:
visitor - the visitor that wishes to visit this node
